author: wsjcom
title: ‘Black Panther’ Tops Box Office for Fifth Straight Weekend
text:
NEW YORK—Not since “Avatar” has a box-office hit had the kind of staying power of “Black Panther.” Ryan Coogler’s comic-book sensation on Sunday became the first film since James Cameron’s 2009 smash to top the weekend box office for five straight weekends.
The Disney release grossed $27 million in ticket sales over the weekend, according to studio estimates, pushing its domestic haul to $605.4 million. World-wide, “Black Panther” has grossed more than $1.1 billion.
